item.description:
Updated 01/07/12 -- Tickets Purchased.

For this Meet-up we will return to the Gamm Theater for "Festen." Here is the description on the Gamm's website:

"Helge is turning sixty, and everyone is coming home for the party. His eldest son, Christian, whose twin sister, Linda, recently committed suicide, will raise the first toast… and reveal a shocking family secret. Trapped for 24 hours within the walls of the lavish country estate—rocked by revelations that shatter the veneer of respectability—even the disbelieving guests are choosing sides as the truth painfully unfolds. Adapted from the award-winning 1998 Danish film by the same title (released in the U.S. as “The Celebration”), Festen redefines tragedy for a modern age. For mature audiences only."

Ticket Information

Tickets are $46.75 (including Gamm's Convenience Charge.). Seating is reserved. (Prices at Gamm have gone up for 2011/12.  They are now $42.00 plus a $4.75 convenience charge.)

RSVPs for this Meetup will close on Friday, January 6th. I will purchase the tickets on the 7th.

Meet-up Logistics

We will meet at the Gamm Theater at 7:30 PM. I will also provide my cell number in case you need to reach me.

Payment Options

When you RSVP, there will be a question asking how you wish to pay for your ticket.  Please note that I must have payment prior to January 7th so I can purchase our tickets.  I'm open to any option other than a personal check.  Here are my preferred choices:

1) If you're going to another Meetup with me prior to 1/7/12, you may pay me in cash or cashiers check at that time.

2) I can provide my mailing address and you can send me a cashiers check or money order.  (No personal checks.)  Remember, though, that I need it before 1/7/12.

3) Provide your e-mail address and I will send you a Paypal Invoice.  You may use that invoice to pay by credit card or direct bank debit.  Note that you do NOT need a Paypal account to pay by credit card.

Refund Policy

Full refunds (including the convenience charge) will be provided if you change your RSVP to "NO" on or before 01/06/12.

Full refunds (including the convenience charge) will be provided if the play is sold out and we are unable to get tickets.

Once tickets are purchased on 01/07/12, no refunds will be provided.  You will be responsible for the disposal of your ticket if you're unable to attend.
item.name: Festen
